message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'd be willing to go $100 for the product. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I've decided to counter with a price of $110. This reflects the value we place on the product while still being competitive.
